discussion.p: The table in /1 says that regex_constants::collate "Specifies that character ranges of the form "[a-b]" shall be locale sensitive.", but /14 says that it affects individual character comparisons too.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3691.

li.p: In /1, Table 138 — "syntax_option_type effects", change as indicated:

tr.td: Specifies that character ranges of the form "[a-b]"comparisons and character range comparisons shall be locale sensitive.
